profile:
Need Residential Wood Framing? Look no further!

Welcome to EMMAX CONSTRUCTION Framing Specialists! 

We are a team of professionals staffed with the best wood framing specialists and contractors in the construction business providing quality construction. located in Lower Mainland, BC.

Resized_20190201_131358.jpg
New Home Construction Framing and Foundation.jpg
Free Estimates -

All of our estimates are free. There is absolutely no obligation when having one of our representatives out to discuss your next project. We encourage you to ask all the questions you may have about this or any other upcoming projects.

Why Choose Us?

We believe that successful projects begin with strong relationships. Trust, integrity, and open communication are crucial factors upon which we build a foundation for great work.
services: Safety, Quality and Efficiency what make EMMAX Construction Company. No project is too big or too small for EMMAX Construction company. Each project is assigned one of our supervisors who will measure your job for material, assign & supervise the installation of that material until it complete.
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on service provided.
